getAttackedPiece() - Method in class com.chess.board.Move.CaptureMove
getAttackedPiece() is an method that we override from the parent class because it is an attacking move and an attacking move needs an attackedPiece so for CaptureMoves there is always an attacked piece so this method allows the caller to get the attackedPiece
